location: England, Essex, Colchester, Balkerne Gate, St Mary's Hospital
description: An obscure site, located at the Union or St Mary's Hospital outside the Balkerne Gate. Very few details survive and judging by the plan it is a presumed temple or tomb building (the difference is up for debate).
bibliography: Hull, M. R. In Roman Colchester, 259 ff. Society of Antiquaries, 1958.
Smith, Alex. “The Fate of Pagan Temples in Sount-East Britain during the Late and Post-Roman Periods.” In Ritual Landscapes of Roman South-East Britain, edited by David Rudling, 2008.
